item.title: Adnoc’s long Covestro chase set to achieve Europe’s largest takeover of year
item.description: UAE oil company’s lengthy courtship and sweetened €14.4bn bid key to overcoming German chemical group’s reluctance For Adnoc, with its headquarters pictured above, the deal is part of a five-year, $150bn plan to transform itself from a traditional ...

item.title: ADNOC’s expansion into Europe: 7 landmark deals diversifying its energy operations
item.description: Covestro takeover talks: ADNOC is in advanced negotiations with German chemicals giant Covestro over a potential EUR11.7bn($12.55bn) takeover. The energy giant has been in talks with Covestro for over a year and has made a final offer of EUR62 ($66.62 ...
